TopicTitle: I'm Tempted To Introduce Myself As A Badass, but Lets Stay True To Who We Are

Articles.Content:
So, I guess it's time to say hello! I'm Dylan, relatively new to Kerbal Space. I must say, thank goodness I watched a load of videos about KSP before getting it is such a major boost. I know about asparagus thanks to Jefmajor/One F Jef, I know if there are any good mods thanks to EnterElysium, and it's really given me a great boost.

I play on my laptop, so if I do post screenshots, expect those of the lowest quality!

Welcome aboard! Also a laptoper, though mine is rather briefly.

After some time in KSP, a badass you may be!
If we measure badassery based on the number of innocent Kerbalnauts I have killed (most of which were not intentional), then I am the baddest of the bad!
